snippet: Universal Pictures is the top grossing studio so far this year, and its 2013 lead will likely be enhanced by the release of “Oblivion,” starring Tom Cruise, as well as other sequels.
lead_paragraph: Universal Pictures is the top grossing studio so far this year, and its 2013 lead will likely be enhanced by the release of “Oblivion,” starring Tom Cruise, as well as other sequels.
